snippet: The financial editor of NBC’s “Today” show and Time for Kids, a division of Time Inc., have introduced a magazine intended to teach financial literacy to fourth, fifth and sixth graders.
abstract: Jean Chatzky, financial editor of NBC's Today show, and Time Inc division Time for Kids introduce magazine Your $, which will teach financial literacy to fourth, fifth and sixth graders.
lead_paragraph: The financial editor of NBC’s “Today” show and Time for Kids, a division of Time Inc., have introduced a magazine intended to teach financial literacy to fourth, fifth and sixth graders.

headline.main: New Magazine Teaches Children Financial Lessons
headline.print_headline: New Magazine Teaches Children Financial Lessons
